translations: 比赛（tournament 的复数）；锦标赛

sentences.sentence: Seles won 10 tournaments, and was the undisputed world champion.
sentences.translation: 塞莱斯赢了10次锦标赛，是无异议的世界冠军。

sentences.sentence: It was all a far cry from those halcyon days in 1990, when he won three tournaments on the European tour.
sentences.translation: 这和1990年的那些美好时光迥然不同，当时他在欧洲巡回赛中赢了三场锦标赛。

sentences.sentence: He won 11 of his 12 claycourt tournaments in 2005, including his first slam at the French Open.
sentences.translation: 2005年，他在红土赛场的12场比赛中赢了11场，包括他在法网的第一次大满贯。
